content: रंभा {@--1@} A plantain tree; विजितरंभमूरुद्वयं <ls>Gīt. 10</ls>; पिबोरुरंभातरु पीवरोरु <ls>N. 22. 43</ls>, <ls n="N.">2. 37.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Gaurī. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of an {%apsaras%}, wife of Nalakūbara and considered as the most beautiful woman in the paradise of Indra; तरुमूरुयुगेन सुंदरी किमु रंभां परिणाहिना परम् . तरुणीमपि जिष्णुरेव तां धनदापत्यतपःफलस्तनीं .. <ls>N. 2. 37.</ls> {@--4@} A harlot. {@--5@} Sounding. roaring. {@--6@} The lowing of cows. {@--7@} A kind of rice.
